name: WalliBot
description: A simple bot based on Pyrogram to handle wallpapers sent by users.

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or you can leave it as it is

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or you can leave it as it is

ADMIN_LIST.description: List of numerical IDs of Admins separated, by space

IGNORE_LIST.description: List of numerical IDs of Users to be ignored by bot, separated by space

REQUEST_ID.description: Numerical ID of Group of Admins starting with -100
